mapper.select: SELECT EDU_NO, EDU_TITLE, EDU_PEOPLE, EDU_TARGET, TO_CHAR(EDU_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as EDU_START, TO_CHAR(EDU_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as EDU_END, EDU_PROGRESS FROM EDU

SELECT EDU_NO, EDU_TITLE, EDU_DESC, EDU_LOC, EDU_TIME, EDU_TEACHER, EDU_PEOPLE, EDU_TARGET, TO_CHAR(EDU_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as EDU_START, TO_CHAR(EDU_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as EDU_END, EDU_COST FROM EDU WHERE EDU_NO = #{EDU_NO}
SELECT e.emp_no, e.emp_name, p.pos_name, d.dept_name FROM EMPLOYEE e, DEPARTMENT d, "POSITION" p WHERE e.dept_no=d.DEPT_NO AND e.POS_NO = p.POS_NO
